00033 #include <string.h>
00034 
00035 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00036 #include "BLI_memarena.h"
00037 #include "BLI_heap.h"
00038 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"

00040 /***/
00041 
00042 struct HeapNode {
00043     void *ptr;
00044     float value;
00045     int index;
00046 };
00047 
00048 struct Heap {
00049     unsigned int size;
00050     unsigned int bufsize;
00051     MemArena *arena;
00052     HeapNode *freenodes;
00053     HeapNode *nodes;
00054     HeapNode **tree;
00055 };
00056 
00057 #define HEAP_PARENT(i) ((i - 1) >> 1)
00058 #define HEAP_LEFT(i)   ((i << 1) + 1)
00059 #define HEAP_RIGHT(i)  ((i << 1) + 2)
00060 #define HEAP_COMPARE(a, b) (a->value < b->value)
00061 #define HEAP_EQUALS(a, b) (a->value == b->value)
00062 #define HEAP_SWAP(heap, i, j) \
00063 {                                                                             \
00064     SWAP(int, heap->tree[i]->index, heap->tree[j]->index);                    \
00065     SWAP(HeapNode *, heap->tree[i], heap->tree[j]);                           \
00066 }
00067 
00068 /***/
00069 
00070 Heap *BLI_heap_new(void)
00071 {
00072     Heap *heap = (Heap *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(Heap), __func__);
00073     heap->bufsize = 1;
00074     heap->tree = (HeapNode **)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(HeapNode *), "BLIHeapTree");
00075     heap->arena = BLI_memarena_new(1 << 16, "heap arena");
00076 
00077     return heap;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void BLI_heap_free(Heap *heap, HeapFreeFP ptrfreefp)
00081 {
00082     int i;
00083 
00084     if (ptrfreefp)
00085         for (i = 0; i < heap->size; i++)
00086             ptrfreefp(heap->tree[i]->ptr);
00087 
00088     MEM_freeN(heap->tree);
00089     BLI_memarena_free(heap->arena);
00090     MEM_freeN(heap);
00091 }
00092 
00093 static void BLI_heap_down(Heap *heap, int i)
00094 {
00095     while (1) {
00096         int size = heap->size, smallest;
00097         int l = HEAP_LEFT(i);
00098         int r = HEAP_RIGHT(i);
00099 
00100         smallest = ((l < size) && HEAP_COMPARE(heap->tree[l], heap->tree[i])) ? l : i;
00101 
00102         if ((r < size) && HEAP_COMPARE(heap->tree[r], heap->tree[smallest]))
00103             smallest = r;
00104 
00105         if (smallest == i)
00106             break;
00107 
00108         HEAP_SWAP(heap, i, smallest);
00109         i = smallest;
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void BLI_heap_up(Heap *heap, int i)
00114 {
00115     while (i > 0) {
00116         int p = HEAP_PARENT(i);
00117 
00118         if (HEAP_COMPARE(heap->tree[p], heap->tree[i]))
00119             break;
00120 
00121         HEAP_SWAP(heap, p, i);
00122         i = p;
00123     }
00124 }
00125 
00126 HeapNode *BLI_heap_insert(Heap *heap, float value, void *ptr)
00127 {
00128     HeapNode *node;
00129 
00130     if ((heap->size + 1) > heap->bufsize) {
00131         int newsize = heap->bufsize * 2;
00132         HeapNode **newtree;
00133 
00134         newtree = (HeapNode **)MEM_mallocN(newsize * sizeof(*newtree), __func__);
00135         memcpy(newtree, heap->tree, sizeof(HeapNode *) * heap->size);
00136         MEM_freeN(heap->tree);
00137 
00138         heap->tree = newtree;
00139         heap->bufsize = newsize;
00140     }
00141 
00142     if (heap->freenodes) {
00143         node = heap->freenodes;
00144         heap->freenodes = (HeapNode *)(((HeapNode *)heap->freenodes)->ptr);
00145     }
00146     else
00147         node = (HeapNode *)BLI_memarena_alloc(heap->arena, sizeof *node);
00148 
00149     node->value = value;
00150     node->ptr = ptr;
00151     node->index = heap->size;
00152 
00153     heap->tree[node->index] = node;
00154 
00155     heap->size++;
00156 
00157     BLI_heap_up(heap, heap->size - 1);
00158 
00159     return node;
00160 }
00161 
00162 int BLI_heap_empty(Heap *heap)
00163 {
00164     return (heap->size == 0);
00165 }
00166 
00167 int BLI_heap_size(Heap *heap)
00168 {
00169     return heap->size;
00170 }
00171 
00172 HeapNode *BLI_heap_top(Heap *heap)
00173 {
00174     return heap->tree[0];
00175 }
00176 
00177 void *BLI_heap_popmin(Heap *heap)
00178 {
00179     void *ptr = heap->tree[0]->ptr;
00180 
00181     heap->tree[0]->ptr = heap->freenodes;
00182     heap->freenodes = heap->tree[0];
00183 
00184     if (heap->size == 1)
00185         heap->size--;
00186     else {
00187         HEAP_SWAP(heap, 0, heap->size-1);
00188         heap->size--;
00189 
00190         BLI_heap_down(heap, 0);
00191     }
00192 
00193     return ptr;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void BLI_heap_remove(Heap *heap, HeapNode *node)
00197 {
00198     int i = node->index;
00199 
00200     while (i > 0) {
00201         int p = HEAP_PARENT(i);
00202 
00203         HEAP_SWAP(heap, p, i);
00204         i = p;
00205     }
00206 
00207     BLI_heap_popmin(heap);
00208 }
00209 
00210 float BLI_heap_node_value(HeapNode *node)
00211 {
00212     return node->value;
00213 }

00215 void *BLI_heap_node_ptr(HeapNode *node)
00216 {
00217     return node->ptr;
00218 }
